room_title: Escape room "The Pharaoh's Curse" by The Hidden Passage in Los Angeles
room_address: 7430 Coldwater Cyn Ave. Unit B, North Hollywood CA 91605
room_description:
Upon the discovery of the long-lost tomb of King Tut, the archaeologists who entered awakened the mummy buried inside. The King is raged and is trying to escape his tomb to bring darkness onto all of Egypt as he wants to avenge his death.The only way to shut the door is from the inside...
You and your fellow archaeologists were brave enough to enter the tomb and seal it. Now you have to find a way to escape the ancient traps and outsmart the cunning King if you want to make it out alive!
